text: daivapriti pratiksiccum tikanna manas'sannidhyatteatum ‎tannalute dhanam celavalikkunnavarute udaharanamita: ‎uyarnna pradesattulla oru teattam; kanatta mala ‎kittiyappeal atiratti vilavu nalki. athava, atinu ‎kanatta malakittate carral mala matraman ‎labhikkunnatenkil atum matiyakum. ninnal ‎ceyyunnatellam kanunnavanan allahu. ‎
